reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress comfortable for hot summer days, with a loose fit around the middle and a length that hits just above the knees. Customers appreciate its flattering design, particularly for curvy figures, and its vibrant color, with one customer noting it's suitable for all ages.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile comfortable tshirt dress
items.body: I like this wayyyy more than I thought it would for the price. It’s a tshirt fabric so it’s soft and stretchy. It’s loose at the waist but not too baggy - you can wear it as is or dress it up with a belt. It does not have pockets. I got the black and it’s a true black. I’ve washed it a couple times inside out and hung dry and it doesn’t seem to be pilling. I’m not sure this dress will last forever but it can be dressed up a little with cute shoes, a jacket and some jewelry. It’s a great weight fabric for hot climates. I will probably get this in more colors. Read more
items.author: Emma

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pure Hot Weather Comfort
items.body: Since I already have 3 of these dresses, I knew what to expect.. The fabric is like a soft t-shirt.. comfortable, nice flow and perfect fit. So cool and breathable during this hot summer. I love the color which is something between tangerine and red.. The cost was so low that I may get another this color. I’ve found the solid colors look better on me than the prints (yellow and brown). Perfect for everyday use just running around to do errands.. I wouldn’t feel it would be appropriate for special occasions.. Read more
items.author: RV

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soo soft and comfortable!
items.body: I’m glad I tried this on! The black is too plain on me, but this dress is easy to dress up with accessories and such. The cuts are flattering. It sits at the bottom of my knees, not the top. (My height is 5’2”.) I found a long knit cardigan to pair it with for modesty. The cardigan really dresses it up. I wore it to a dinner with a cardigan and belt. It has been a great base layer for outfits- even costumes and doubles as a warm slip. I’ve turned it into a tank a couple times by tucking it and bundling the bottom. I would NOT wear this outside the house without a cardigan or shawl to cover me or a thick plain slip to wear underneath. I LOVE wearing it around the house though. So soft and comfortable and lightweight yet warm. The bottom has a swing feel when I moved around, too. I’d buy again. Very versatile. Read more
items.author: Sara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: Great dress at an affordable price. It’s super soft and super thin. But very comfy. Read more
items.author: RG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: I love this dress! So comfortable. So cute! I returned the medium and got a small instead. Fits perfect at top & arm holes but still flowy and roomy at hips. Love the stripes! Read more
items.author: Deborah B

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shrinks a bit
items.body: Really soft and comfortable. But I bought an XL and it was huge so I exchanged for a L. Once washed (in cold water, no dryer) it shrank a bit and now I wish I had kept the XL Read more
items.author: Suzanne G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wounderful, comfortable and simple, good quality
items.body: I love this dresse after 1st one got 2 more in different colors and tried sustainable fabric as well. I am 5'7 125-140 lb ( I fluctuate on scales but my usual size M and measurements always same ) bra size 36B . I am 36 /30/36 with height 5'7 measurements. Size M is absolutely perfect for me , length of dresses is perfect slightly below the knee. I love colores, washed them several times especially red one , it was my first. Washing in cold water on gentle/handwash cycle and flat dry. No color change or change in size or qoulaty of fabric. Dark green had little bit color bleed during first washing but I had it in prewash bucket because I made stain, bleed was minimal especially for 1st washing. They become my favorite dresses this summer for hot Arizona days. I wear them at home as well to go out to not very fancy. Wear assist is as well with belts-looks wounderful and fabric feels very nice on the skin. I probably will order even more in other colors they have. I wish they had more colors without print like true Yellow and orange. I got all my dresses on lightning deals so I don't payed full price nd it gives me extra satisfaction as well. Grate product for grate price. I think they would last for good time. And sizes is consistent in all 3 dresses. Read more
items.author: Elena Agee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy! Soft fabric! Good quality!
items.body: I ordered this on a whim really. I had been looking at it for a while but wasn't sure that it would work for me. But for $10 I figured why not try it. I am so glad I did. I received it yesterday so I haven't gotten to wear it out yet, but I am taking it on vacation with me this month. It is very soft fabric. A little silky almost. Drapes very nicely on the body. I am 6ft tall and 120lbs and a 34A. I ordered a small and it fit well. Under the arms was good with no bra showing. You can wear a regular bra with it because the straps are wider. My only real complaint is that it is kind of short. It hits right below my mid thigh so definitely not a dress for work. But I don't mind the length for a summer going out and about dress. I plan to order more colors. Read more
items.author: Amanda Puskar

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Charcoal Heather, Rayon Blend Navy Tulips, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Yellow Tulips, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Black French Stripe, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Light Brown Leopard Print, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Navy Tile Pattern, Rayon Blend Charcoal Heather, Rayon Blend Grey Heather French Stripe, Rayon Blend Oatmeal Palm Leaf, Rayon Blend Light Brown Leopard Print, Rayon Blend Navy Tile Pattern, Rayon Blend Black, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Navy, Rayon Blend Burgundy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
